thread.title: Greece battles surge in Italy-bound stowaways

title: Greece battles surge in Italy-bound stowaways
text:
Greece battles surge in Italy-bound stowaways Wednesday, March 14, 2018 - 01:48 
The number of migrants attempting to stow away to Italy at Greek ports is on the rise. Some 760 migrants have been arrested in the last two months alone, close to one third of the entire total for 2017.   
The number of migrants attempting to stow away to Italy at Greek ports is on the rise. Some 760 migrants have been arrested in the last two months alone, close to one third of the entire total for 2017.  //reut.rs/2ImBdl8
